item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Mark Klein, AT&T whistleblower who revealed NSA mass spying, has died (816 points | 182 comments)
2. My teen years: The transputer operating system (50 points | 4 comments)
3. Gemini Robotics (661 points | 396 comments)
4. Show HN: Time Portal – Get dropped into history, guess where you landed (235 points | 131 comments)
5. Practical UX for startups surviving without a designer (148 points | 39 comments)
6. Iconography of the PuTTY tools (218 points | 54 comments)
7. The DuckDB Local UI (660 points | 147 comments)
8. xlskubectl – a spreadsheet to control your Kubernetes cluster (42 points | 19 comments)
9. Switching from Pyenv to Uv (185 points | 106 comments)
10. A GS-Cache Inference Framework for Large-Scale Gaussian Splatting Models (6 points | discuss)
11. Three Implementation Models for Scheme (1987) [pdf] (13 points | 1 comment)
12. Tell Mozilla: it's time to ditch Google (260 points | 281 comments)
13. The Night Watch (2013) [pdf] (93 points | 18 comments)
14. Zinc, a systems programming language prototype (97 points | 33 comments)
15. Reverse engineering OpenAI code execution to make it run C and JavaScript (206 points | 54 comments)
16. Shenmue (1999) reverse engineering reveals possible sun position oversight (128 points | 49 comments)
17. Peer-to-peer file transfers in the browser (434 points | 207 comments)
18. The cultural divide between mathematics and AI (181 points | 113 comments)
19. The Future Is Niri (325 points | 165 comments)
20. The insecurity of telecom stacks in the wake of Salt Typhoon (272 points | 174 comments)
21. Gemma 3 Technical Report [pdf] (416 points | 221 comments)
22. 'Uber for nurses' exposes 86K+ medical records, PII via open S3 bucket (167 points | 105 comments)
23. I Built a Mechanical Calculator [video] (62 points | 20 comments)
24. Apple has locked me in the same cage Microsoft's built for Windows 10 users (136 points | 145 comments)
25. I use Cursor daily - here's how I avoid the garbage parts (157 points | 172 comments)
26. I stopped everything and started writing C again (276 points | 282 comments)
27. My stupid noise journey (2023) (112 points | 135 comments)
28. Open-UI: Maintain an open standard for UI and promote its adherence and adoption (292 points | 93 comments)
29. Constant-Time Code: The Pessimist Case [pdf] (72 points | 61 comments)
30. Artie (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #3 ( | hide)
